job description:
.Net Developer, St. Louis, MO

We are only interested in candidates that we can hire directly without sponsorship. LOCAL candidates only or only candidates that will face to face interview on site in St. Louis MO. The role is located here in St. Louis MO. We cannot provide sponsorship.

Data Science and Platform Engineering
  • Developing robust software systems across the technology stack
  • Identifying and incorporating software best practices and other technology platforms into our environment
  • Participating in the collaborative software design and development process
  • Working with an integrated agile development team, participating in code review, conflict resolution, deliverable estimation and software respiratory management
Requirements
  • 5+ years' experience in developing C# web applications in an MVC environment
  • Demonstrated experience with the Git code repository toolset or other version control frameworks
  • Direct experience working with database technologies
  • Strong JSON API development experience
  • Experience with cloud architectures and development environments, as well as JavaScript, HTML & CSS, or other front-end software frameworks
  • Strong planning, organizing, problem solving and strong critical thinking skills
  • Ability and experience efficiently executing project tasks and a track record of producing deliverables under tight release deadlines
  • Excellent communication skills and receptive to feedback on code and software-level outputs
  • Python experience a plus
Associated topics: .net, algorithm, back end, c c++, java, php, sdet, software developer, software engineer, sw
